problems.title: Check Triangle Type
problems.description:
Given three sides of a triangle, determine and print its type:
- Equilateral: All three sides are equal
- Isosceles: Exactly two sides are equal
- Scalene: All three sides are different

Input Format:
Three integers separated by space representing the three sides.

Output Format:
Print "Equilateral", "Isosceles", or "Scalene".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5 5 5

Sample Output
Equilateral

Sample Input
5 5 3

Sample Output
Isosceles

Sample Input
3 4 5

Sample Output
Scalene

Explanation:
Compare sides using nested conditions to determine triangle type.
hintsList: First check if all three sides are equal (Equilateral). Then check if any two sides are equal (Isosceles). Otherwise it's Scalene.
